name: InfiniRealm
description: Osbourne Explorare is a volunteer for UniCorps, a company that surveys other planets in search of new life. However, he isn't exactly a space explorer... instead, his exploration is done through a virtual space, in which he explores the same worlds with different variations over and over. The data he gathers will often prompt UniCorps to give him new tools and information to use! Explore endless worlds and uncover the secrets of the universe!
